property.name: themeBackgroundColor
property.label: Card Background Color
property.description: Color of the card background for the metric. Can be CSS color keywords (e.g. darkmagenta), HEX values (e.g. #581C5B), or RGB values (e.g. rgb(88,28,91))

property.name: themeMetricTextColor
property.label: Metric Text Color
property.description: Color of the metric value. Can be CSS color keywords (e.g. darkmagenta), HEX values (e.g. #581C5B), or RGB values (e.g. rgb(88,28,91))

property.name: themeMetricLabelColor

property.description: Color of the metric label. Can be CSS color keywords (e.g. darkmagenta), HEX values (e.g. #581C5B), or RGB values (e.g. rgb(88,28,91))
